title: 1119 31 "The Entrusted Message! King Cobra's Resolve"Transliteration: "Takusareta Messēji! Kobura-Ō no Kakugo" (Japanese:託された伝言！コブラ王の覚悟) Yasuhiro Tanabe Atsuhiro Tomioka Ziwei He &Masahiro Shimanuki September 15, 2024(2024-09-15) 2.5%[35]
transformers_text: 1119 31 The Entrusted Message King Cobra's Resolve Transliteration Taku s are ta Mess ji Ko bur a no Kaku go Japanese Yasuhiro Tanabe Atsuhiro To mio ka Zi wei He Masahiro S him an uki September 15 2024 2024 09 15 2 5 35 Imu reveals to Cobra that D links to a historic mistake by Nefertari Lili which unleashed the Pone glyphs After Cobra confirms Lili s full name has a D in it Imu stabs him S abo intervenes but flees with Cobra who wants to send a message to Luffy and Viv i that the entire Nefertari family has D in their names S abo escapes while Wa pol who witnesses Cobra's murder runs away Meanwhile Viv i is restrained by CP 0 but manages to escape with Wa pol
tf_idf_text: entrust message king cobra resolve transliteration taku mess bur kaku japanese yasuhiro tanabe atsuhiro mio wei masahiro uki september imu reveals cobra link historic mistake nefertari lili unleash pone glyph cobra confirm lili full name imu stab abo intervenes flees cobra want send message luffy viv entire nefertari family name abo escape pol witness cobra murder run away meanwhile viv restrain manages escape pol
